subSubSection.paragraph:
First recorded from Finland by
Zatwarnicki and Kahanpaeae (2014)
. Previously known from Archangelsk Oblast (NW European Russia) and Kazakhstan ( Krivosheina 2001 ).
Paratype specimen http://id.luomus.fi/GV.4185 is illustrated in Fig. 4a, c.
